alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rabun and south central Macon Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Franklin, or 4 miles north of Dillard. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain City, Dillard, Sky Valley, Black Rock Mountain State Park, Scaly Mountain and Otto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
